channel.title: Refined Power: Able to place multiple Water Turbine per node
channel.description: Hello, I am able to build multiple water turbine mk1's on the same water node, as long as there is room next to the original machine. If I point at the node, it will shift the building to the side of the existing turbine, and it will allow me to build. Easily replicable on the nodes near -117,000 / -26,000 at the waterfalls, because there is plenty of room.

item.title: Refined Power: Able to place multiple Water Turbine per node
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

fixed in a patch soon
